content: **knitted socks in drops nord the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch with nordic pattern and houses sizes 35 - 43 theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #frostytownsocks drops design pattern no-108 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** shoe-size 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22 - 24 - 27 cm leg-length to heel 16 - 17 - 18 cm **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-100-100 g colour 22 chestnut 50-50-50 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember the needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get to few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
